definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Stir in the cream and reheat to serving temperature without boiling.
sentences.chinese: 攪拌奶油，不用煮加熱到合適的溫度。

sentences.english: The finish is long and supple. Creamy pasta dishes, quiches or with cheese.
sentences.chinese: 這款酒是奶油意大利麪或奶酪的最佳搭配。

sentences.english: W:You want some cream in the coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你要在咖啡里加點奶油嗎？

sentences.english: Place whipping cream, coconut juice and milk in a sauce pot and boil.
sentences.chinese: 鮮奶油，椰汁和牛奶入鍋煮沸。

sentences.english: Using condensed milk and cream makes for a quicker process.
sentences.chinese: 加入煉乳和奶油會使製作時間縮短。

sentences.english: Occasionally, they also are a cream color.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，他們也有奶油色。

sentences.english: He will eat curds and honey when he knows enough to reject the wrong and choose the right.
sentences.chinese: 到他曉得棄惡擇善的時候，他必喫奶油與蜂蜜。

sentences.english: How did you get them iced so evenly?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼能把奶油塗這麼勻呢？

sentences.english: Er, I want a normal popcorn with extra butter and extra salt .
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我要一盤加奶油和鹽的爆米花。

sentences.english: I place my block of cream cheese into my mixer.
sentences.chinese: 把一塊奶油乳酪放進混鐵爐。

sentences.english: Butter and popcorn was bound to be a match made in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 奶油加上爆米花絕對是來自天堂的絕配。

sentences.english: Cream the butter and sugar and beat in the eggs, one at a time.
sentences.chinese: 把黃油和白糖攪成奶油狀，把蛋打進去，一次一個。

sentences.english: Please mix sugar and cream fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 請把砂糖和奶油對半參加。

sentences.english: Rib Eye, with Roasted Provencal Potatoes, Spinach Cream and Vegetable Ragout.
sentences.chinese: 肉眼牛肉，配香草烤土豆，奶油菠菜和燴蔬菜。

sentences.english: When the cream rises to the top, it separates itself from the milk.
sentences.chinese: 當奶油浮到頂部的時候，它會和牛奶分離。

sentences.english: The soybean oil massively uses in boiling no matter what with manufacture oleomargarine.
sentences.chinese: 大豆油大量用於烹任和製造人造奶油。
